Name: alpha thalassemia
Definition: Alpha thalassemia is a thalassemia involving the genes HBA1and HBA2 hemoglobin genes.

Name: beta thalassemia
Definition: A thalassemia characterized by the reduced or absent synthesis of the beta globin chains of hemoglobin.

Name: obsolete histoplasmosis endocarditis
Definition: A histoplasmosis endocarditis that results_in inflammation located_in endocardium
